arukgoda nishpadana kalamanakaruwo - layanal panduwawala / kumaradasa jayasinha nishchala chayarupa - premadasa kuragama pupurana drawya ha wedi pipirawim â€“ karunadasa athurugiriya / gamini jayasundara sakasuma â€“ rajya chithrapata sanstha chithragaraya, lanka chithragaraya shabda paripalanaya , githa patigatha kirima - jorj manathunga debas patigatha kirima - sent jon rasayanagaraya - honkon kalar muwi lab shabda sahaya â€“ layanal gunarathna / sirisena perera / eebraham / punchihewa / riyas athireka shabda â€“ marwin bens, disanayaka chithrapata samagama sangitha adhyakshanaya - sarath dasanayakagitha - dakkothin dasin â€“ ech. aar. jothipala, feà·Šradi silwa - pada rachanaya â€“ karunarathna abesekara nilwana ladde â€“ wiktar rathnayaka / nanda malini â€“ pada rachanaya â€“ ajantha ranasinha pani moramal - ti. em. jayarathna â€“ pada rachanaya - jorj lesli ranasinhanalu niliyan - reks kodippili (kadira), shriyani amarasena (mali), robin pranandu (ranbanda), hiyugo pranandu (korala), swarna mallawaaarachchi (muthu), feà·Šradi silwa (pina), kinsli disanayaka (thambi), gamunu wijesuriya (gurunanse), saranapala suriyaaarachchi (sajant), jo abewikrama (punchi aarachchi), winsant was ( punchi rala), somi rathnayaka (dingirala), piyadasa gunasekara (wedikkaraya), sunilsoma piris (sagaya), rathnapriya jayasuriya (kosthapal), bi. dab. piyadasa (kosthapal), ralp wijesekara (ukkurala), swarna mallawaaarachchi, rathnawali kakunawala, nayomi indika dasanayaka, aberathna jayasuriya, kumaradasa jayasinha, bi.
